accountsettings

Class AccountSettingsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • accountsettings.AccountSettingsController

  • public class AccountSettingsController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the controller for the AccountSettings.fxml scene. This class allows user to change their password, email and username. James created scene and the functionality of being able to change picture. Ryan changed scene and added update function to the database on 11/13/2018. Ryan Added format check for text fields and alert boxes to let user know of errors and successful input on 11/15/2018.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AccountSettingsController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void backMenuPushed()
      When this button is pushed, the scene will change to the MainMenuDrive.fxml.
      void changeEmailButton()
      When this button is pushed, the email field is checked for correct format.
      void changeImageButtonPushed()
      When this button is pushed, it will open the users files and allow the user to place a picture inside to change the present image.
      void changePasswordButton()
      When this button is pushed, the pswd field is checked for correct format and if equals pswd2.
      void changeUsernameButton()
      When this button is pushed, the username field is checked for correct format.
      void getDriverOrRiderScene(User user)
      This method will change to the main.MinaMenuDrive.fxml scene if the isAdriver boolean for the type users.user is true.
      void initialize()
      Transfers the users.user type created in login.Logincontroller that holds all the user information from the database.
      void mainMenuButtonPushed()
      When this button is pushed, the scene will change to the MainMenu scene.
      boolean updateDatabase(User user)
      When this method is called, the USERINFO table's USERNAME, PASSWORD and EMAIL column will be updated.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • AccountSettingsController

        public AccountSettingsController()

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()

        Transfers the users.user type created in login.Logincontroller that holds all the user information from the database.

      • backMenuPushed

        public void backMenuPushed()
                    throws java.io.IOException
        When this button is pushed, the scene will change to the MainMenuDrive.fxml.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - the IO exception.

      • mainMenuButtonPushed

        public void mainMenuButtonPushed()
                          throws java.io.IOException
        When this button is pushed, the scene will change to the MainMenu scene.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - the IO exception.

      • changeImageButtonPushed

        public void changeImageButtonPushed()

        When this button is pushed, it will open the users files and allow the user to place a picture inside to change the present image.

      • updateDatabase

        public boolean updateDatabase(User user)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        When this method is called, the USERINFO table's USERNAME, PASSWORD and EMAIL column will be updated.
        Parameters:
        user - the person using the application.
        Returns:
        returns true if username is not taken.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - the SQLException.

      • changeUsernameButton

        public void changeUsernameButton()
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        When this button is pushed, the username field is checked for correct format. If username field is in correct format, will allow user to update username in USERINFO table;
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - the SQL exception.

      • changeEmailButton

        public void changeEmailButton()
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        When this button is pushed, the email field is checked for correct format. If email field is in correct format, will allow user to update email in USERINFO table.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - the SQL Exception.

      • changePasswordButton

        public void changePasswordButton()
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        When this button is pushed, the pswd field is checked for correct format and if equals pswd2. If pswd field is in correct format and equals pswd2, will allow user to update password in USERINFO table.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - the SQL Exception.

      • getDriverOrRiderScene

        public void getDriverOrRiderScene(User user)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        This method will change to the main.MinaMenuDrive.fxml scene if the isAdriver boolean for the type users.user is true. The scene will change to main.MainMenuRide.fxml if it is false.
        Parameters:
        user - The user's information pulled from the database, only the isAdriver field is used in this method.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - the IO exception.
